mdRecord.dcterms:title: South Carolina Room, Mount Vernon Mansion.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the southwest corner of the dining room at Mount Vernon. The view includes the fireplace, a table, corner display case, multiple portraits and other furnishings. The following text is printed directly onto the reverse of the cardboard mount: South Carolina Room, Mount Vernon Mansion. Family Dining Room. A portion of text is covered by a small newspaper article adhered to the mount. The article clarifies that Ann Pamela Cunningham was the founder of the Mount Vernon Ladies' Association.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Dining Room
